MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH47 postcode area of Bathgate, affecting properties in Almond Square and surrounding areas We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.31pm. Our engineers have established there is an underground cable fault outside 19 Almond Square. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to the complexity of the repairs required and we are awaiting additional resources getting to site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:10PM on Wednesday 11 November 2020
